resources.string: What goes up, must go up some more

Calculate what historical, inflation adjusted money is worth today. The months from January 1960 to present are supported.

Data retrieved from http://inflationcalc.co.za, created by Renier Crause

All calculations are based on the official inflation index data available at www.statssa.gov.za/

 Modified images used are compliant with the CC BY-NC-ND 2.0 license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/2.0/)
